meanings.definition: Formed in the shape of a semicircle.
meanings.sent1: The rainbow had a semicircled appearance in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The semicircled table fit perfectly in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent3: The semicircled cake looked like a delicious half-moon.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was semicircled, radiating warmth to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The semicircled garden path led to a hidden fountain.

meanings.definition: To move in a semicircular path.
meanings.sent1: The dancer semicircled gracefully across the stage.
meanings.sent2: The car semicircled around the roundabout before exiting.
meanings.sent3: The cat semicircled the toy mouse before pouncing on it.
meanings.sent4: The airplane semicircled above the airport before landing.
meanings.sent5: The river semicircled around the small island, creating a peaceful flow.

meanings.definition: Having the shape of half a circle.
meanings.sent1: The semicircled window allowed sunlight to filter into the room.
meanings.sent2: The semicircled archway framed the entrance to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The semicircled mirror reflected only half of the room.
meanings.sent4: The semicircled moon shone brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The semicircled pond mirrored the clear blue sky above.
